sect3.title: Selecting annotations
sect3.para: This is special mode to shown and selecting anotations on page. On activation its, show rectangle round every annotation (show activation rectangle for each of annotations). It's very usefull, because user see all annotations on page and couldn't search where are they.
Anotations are selected one by one according as mouse cursor is over them. Last annotation is selected while cursor is not over other annotation or while don't press Esc key.
